original_text: “Accept these from them, that they may be used in the service of the tent of meeting, and give them to the Levites, to each man according to his service.”
korean_text: 그것을 그들에게서 받아 레위인에게 주어 각기 직임대로 회막 봉사에 쓰게 할지니라

sentences.original_text: that they may be used in the service of the tent of meeting
and give them to the Levites
to each man according to his service
